body.raw:
### Overview UploadShad is a powerful and easy-to-use file uploader component designed for ShadCN forms and React applications. It provides seamless integration, customizable options, and robust handling of file uploads. ##### Breakdown - Install Shadcn and dependant components - Install UploadShad dependencies - Install UploadShad
### Run the CLI Run the shadcn-ui init command and setup your project with Shadcn:
```bash pnpx shadcn-ui@latest init ``` Install the **Form** and dependant Shadcn components by running the following command:
```bash pnpm dlx shadcn-ui@latest add form progress aspect-ratio card ``` ### Installation Install the dependant modules
```bash pnpm add @hello-pangea/dnd sonner react-dropzone sharp uuid @aws-sdk/client-s3 ``` AWS SDK is optional, remove HonoS3 if you don't wish to use it ### Environment Variable For UploadShad to be more user-friendly, it does expect a **AWS_S3_BASE_URL** environment to build urls for image previewing. You can provide a non S3 base url, that matches your storage solution choice.
``` AWS_S3_BASE_URL= ``` ### Install UploadShad Install **UploadShad** by running the following command: (Coming soon)
```bash pnpm install uploadshad ``` Or, use any package manager of your choice. ### Thats it! You have successfully installed UploadShad into your project. ðŸŽ‰ Learn more about [Integrating with Shadcn Form](/integrations/shadcn-form) Learn more about [Integrating with React Hook Form](/integrations/react-hook-form) Learn more about [uploading Files to the Cloud (database/API).](/) Learn more about [how file state management works](/file-state-management), useful for more custom integrations/use cases.
